caption: The image provided originates from GoogleEarth and features arid terrain with visible landforms and erosion patterns. A single windmill is present in the image, located towards the right side of the frame surrounded by the textured landscape.

objects.referring_sentence: The solitary windmill in the image is positioned towards the right edge of the frame.

qa_pairs.question: What is the prominent man-made structure in the image?
What is the primary natural feature in the image?
Is the windmill located on the left or right side of the image?
Is the landscape in the image predominantly flat or rugged?
